Line: But if you don't, I will look for you. I will find you, and I will kill you
The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist
My mom always said life was like a box of chocolates
You will always remember this as the day that you almost caught Captain Jack Sparrow
I am going to make an offer he can't refuse
You take the blue pill, the story ends. You wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to. You take the red pill, you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.
You either die a hero or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
In case I don't see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and goodnight
